about.title: Who We Are
about.paragraph1: Welcome to Smash Room, where stress meets destruction. We provide a safe, controlled environment for you to smash bottles, break screens, destroy furniture, and experience the ultimate cathartic release.
about.paragraph2: Our state-of-the-art rage room facility features multiple themed destruction rooms, professional-grade safety equipment including helmets and protective gear, and an atmosphere designed to help you break free from stress through controlled, high-energy destruction.
about.paragraph3: Whether you're dealing with work stress, relationship tension, or just need an outlet, Smash Room is your destination for smashing, breaking, and destroying in a safe, controlled environment. Release your rage. Feel the relief.

glass.title: Glass Smashing Room
glass.description: Smash bottles, glassware, and breakables with sledgehammers and bats. Feel the satisfying shatter of glass as you release your stress. Safety gear provided.

footer.description: Release your stress through controlled destruction. Smash, break, and destroy in a safe, controlled environment.

safety.question: What safety equipment is provided?
safety.answer: We provide full protective gear including helmets, safety glasses, gloves, and coveralls. All equipment is sanitized between sessions.

items.question: Do I need to bring my own items to break?
items.answer: No! All breakable items are provided. We have a wide selection of glass bottles, electronics, furniture, and more ready for destruction.

age.question: Is there an age requirement?
age.answer: Participants must be 18 years or older. Valid ID is required upon arrival.

duration.question: How long is a typical session?
duration.answer: Standard sessions are 30 minutes, but we offer extended packages up to 60 minutes for maximum stress relief.

group.question: Can I book for a group?
group.answer: Yes! We offer group packages for parties, team building, and events. Multiple rooms can be booked simultaneously.

clothing.question: What should I wear?
clothing.answer: Wear comfortable clothes you don't mind getting dirty. Closed-toe shoes are required. We provide all protective gear.
